name: Pong Evolve
description:
A contestant of the 2020 Epic MegaJam

Developed in 5 days Pong Evolve is a reinvention of the "first" game - Pong. Looking at how the game would look through each decade and possibly the future. 

How to Play:

 - To score hit a ball past the opponent's paddle

 - Defeat the opponent by scoring higher than the 'Score to Win' set in the Main Menu

 - Defend your area using your paddle to hit ball away

1970 - 2000 Controls:

Up Arrow: 

 - Moves paddle up

Down Arrow:

 - Moves paddle down

Space Bar:

 - Pauses game

2010+ Controls:

Mouse:

 - Paddle will move and follow the player's mouse position

Space Bar:

 - Pauses game
